verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just want to love,
I just want to sing
To the One above
Who has touched this thirsty soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And now I'll never be the same.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'll always love You,
I'll always sing to You, Jesus.
I long to worship You in spirit and in truth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Every day I'll come,
Spend my life with You,
Learning of Your heart
And what You're calling me to do.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: My every breath belongs to You.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And with this song
We'll lift the name of Jesus higher,
And with a shout
We'll raise up one voice.
